DataSource.query:
SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT        
CONVERT(int, fy.NAME) AS yr,
CONVERT(int, RIGHT('0' + TRIM(REPLACE(FP.NAME, 'Period ', '')), 2)) AS pr,
left(Accts.COSTCENTERVALUE,2) AS CoCode,
Accts.COSTCENTERVALUE AS loc, 
Accts.MAINACCOUNTVALUE AS main, 
ISNULL(Accts.PROJECTVALUE,'000') AS Project, 
ISNULL(Accts.PRODUCTVALUE,'00') AS Product, 
SUM(gjae.ACCOUNTINGCURRENCYAMOUNT) AS data
FROM dbo.GeneralJournalAccountEntry AS gjae
INNER JOIN dbo.DimensionAttributeValueCombination AS Accts  
ON Accts.RECID = gjae.LEDGERDIMENSION
inner join dbo.GeneralJournalEntry AS gje  
ON gjae.GENERALJOURNALENTRY = gje.RECID
inner join dbo.FISCALCALENDARYEAR AS fy  
ON fy.RECID = gje.FISCALCALENDARYEAR AND fy.PARTITION = gje.PARTITION 
inner join dbo.FISCALCALENDARPERIOD AS FP  
ON fy.FISCALCALENDAR = FP.FISCALCALENDAR AND gje.FISCALCALENDARPERIOD = FP.RECID AND gje.PARTITION = FP.PARTITION
WHERE  Accts.COSTCENTERVALUE IS NOT NULL and CONVERT(int, fy.NAME) >= 2024
GROUP BY fy.NAME, FP.NAME, Accts.COSTCENTERVALUE, Accts.MAINACCOUNTVALUE, Accts.PROJECTVALUE, Accts.PRODUCTVALUE
